title: Watts on the Grill
overview: On Watts on the Grill, Spencer Watts brings the heat in this series all about delectable barbecue, featuring unique tips, tricks, and insider techniques for mastering the art of grilling. From concocting the tastiest marinade or rub, to choosing the ideal cut, to pairing salads and sides, and finally to grilling to perfection, Spencer does it all. Spencer prepares four recipes from his sun-drenched outdoor rooftop, whether it's low and slow, high heat, or medium heat. Spencer demonstrates the right techniques to achieve the tastiest barbecue, helping viewers make their summer meals even better.
